featured.text: Therefore, __(30)__ animals’ body parts, many fruits and vegetables can be harvested over and over again without dying. 26.(A) although (B) because (C) when (D) so that 27.(A)
Since the orange trees suffered _____ damage from a storm in the summer, the farmers are expecting a sharp decline in harvests this winter.
Much larger clear blocks are produced in Europe and Canada or harvested from a frozen river in Sweden.

definition.zh_def: 收穫，指農作物的收集或採摘。
definition.en_def: The process of gathering mature crops from the fields.
definition.example: Farmers work hard to harvest the wheat every summer.
